column4: I have a question regarding invoking "sed" - specifically on how to get it to find all *.lua files in all subfolders (ie rather than using ./* which opens all text files in all subfolders). If someone can point me to a different channel where the question is more appropriate, that'd be fine as well :P.
How about something like:  find /path/to/files -iname "*.lua" -exec sed s/whatever/whatever/ -i {}\;
